about_the_game:
Bot Studio for Discord is a tool that allows you to make your own custom Discord bots, without any coding.

Slash Commands, Buttons, and Select Dropdowns

Allow your users to interact with your bots using buttons, selects, and slash commands. These components offer endless customization options for your bots.

Text Commands

Create custom text commands which can be used to trigger responses by the bot.
Examples of command responses:
- Message (Send message, send image, send emoji, send random, etc)
- User Action (Kick user, ban user, add role to user, etc)
- Server Action (Add new role to server, etc)
- Variables (Store values in variables and use them in other responses for truly custom bots)

Server Events

You can also create actions that will run when various server events occur, such as a new user joining the server.
Examples of event triggers:
- When a user joins the server
- When any message is sent

Mods

Bot Studio for Discord is developed in a manner which lends itself to third party mod creation. This gives the community a chance to create more content that they are passionate about.
detailed_description:
Join Our Discord


About the Software

Bot Studio for Discord is a tool that allows you to make your own custom Discord bots, without any coding.

Slash Commands, Buttons, and Select Dropdowns

Allow your users to interact with your bots using buttons, selects, and slash commands. These components offer endless customization options for your bots.

Text Commands

Create custom text commands which can be used to trigger responses by the bot.
Examples of command responses:
- Message (Send message, send image, send emoji, send random, etc)
- User Action (Kick user, ban user, add role to user, etc)
- Server Action (Add new role to server, etc)
- Variables (Store values in variables and use them in other responses for truly custom bots)

Server Events

You can also create actions that will run when various server events occur, such as a new user joining the server.
Examples of event triggers:
- When a user joins the server
- When any message is sent

Mods

Bot Studio for Discord is developed in a manner which lends itself to third party mod creation. This gives the community a chance to create more content that they are passionate about.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The easiest way to make Discord bots. A drag and drop editor makes it simple to create the perfect bot for your servers, no coding required!
